title: Create Reports and Analytics API for VitaTrack
instruction: Implement comprehensive reports and analytics API for VitaTrack health insights. Create daily, weekly, and monthly health reports, nutrition analysis, fitness progress summaries, and goal achievement analytics. Implement trend analysis, correlation studies, and predictive health insights. Setup custom report generation, data export functionality, and visualization data preparation. Include comparative analysis, peer benchmarking, and personalized health recommendations based on comprehensive data analysis.
